name: src/animation.js
Animation
description: Simple but efficient animation helper with batched requestAnimationFrame

name: startTime
description: Calculate when to start the animation

name: endTime
description: Calculate when to end the animation

src/el.js
src/index.js
src/observable.js
one
description: Add listener by name, which triggers only one

name: off
description: Remove all listeners, or by name, or by name & handler

name: src/prefix.js
src/raf.js
src/translate.js
translate
description: Create translate(x, y) (desktop), translate3d(x, y, 0) (mobile) or translate3d(x, y, z)

name: src/utils.js
extendable
description: Makes Class extendable by adding Class.extend

name: src/view.js
View
description: VanillaJS helper for single DOM element

properties.description: Anything else you want to pass on to View

params.name: data
params.description: Any data to pass on to init()

name: setAttr
description: Sets/removes View element attribute (only if changed)

params.name: value
params.description: Attribute value or null to remove

name: setClass
description: Sets/removes View element class (only if changed)

name: setStyle
description: Sets/removes View element style (only if changed)

params.name: value
params.description: Style value or null to remove

name: setText
description: Sets View element textContent (only if changed)

params.name: text
params.description: Text to be applied to textContent

name: setHTML
description: Sets View element innerHTML (only if changed)

name: addListener
description: Adds proxy event listener to View

name: removeListener
description: Removes all proxy event listeners from View, or by name, or by name and handler

name: addBefore
description: Adds child View before another View/HTMLElement

name: setChildren
description: Replace children with Views or ViewList

name: src/viewlist.js
ViewList
description: VanillaJS helper for list of DOM elements

properties.name: View
properties.description: View Class to create new Views with
Anything else you want to pass on to View

name: constructor
description: Creates list of Views to be mounted to a View

name: lookup
description: Views by key, if key provided

name: setData
description: Sync list of Views with data provided

params.name: data
params.description: Data for syncing list of Views
